医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有 COVID-19 的 COPD 患者的结果标志物研究人员确定了 COPD 患者重症 COVID-19 和死亡的潜在标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Outcome-markers-in-COPD-病人-with-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Outcome-markers-in-COPD-病人-with-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cf40b57-38e9-4b34-8af8-66392f74689c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:10:00 -0400 Outcome markers in COPD patients with COVID-19
替考拉宁不敏感的表皮葡萄球菌菌株是否在增加？研究人员阐明了替考拉宁不敏感表皮葡萄球菌（Teico-NS S. epidermidis）六年来的发病模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Are-teicoplanin-non-susceptible-Staphylococcus-epidermidis-strains-increasing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Are-teicoplanin-non-susceptible-Staphylococcus-epidermidis-strains-increasing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e01a6e56-8499-461d-8ee6-23bc41cc8c16 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:01:00 -0400 Are teicoplanin-non-susceptible Staphylococcus epidermidis strains increasing?
鉴定与卵巢癌风险相关的血浆蛋白研究人员进行了蛋白质组学孟德尔随机化和共定位分析，以确定卵巢癌的药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Identification-of-plasma-蛋白质-关联-with-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Identification-of-plasma- Proteins-linked-with-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65bd9937-63d1-4f99-9961-57c8cc21e353 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:57:00 -0400 Identification of plasma proteins associated with ovarian cancer risk
研究发现挖鼻孔可能会增加医护人员的 COVID-19 风险研究人员调查了医护人员的身体和行为特征（例如挖鼻孔）是否会增加 SARS-CoV-2 感染的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-that-nose-picking-may-increase-COVID-19-risk-in-health-care-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-that-nose-picking-may-increase-COVID-19-risk-in-health-care-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4bb2054-22e1-49ca-b903-cf1a6d62ce91 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:53:00 -0400 Study finds that nose-picking may increase COVID-19 risk in health care workers
研究发现肠易激综合症、胃肠道疾病和精神疾病之间存在遗传重叠研究人员描述了肠易激综合症的遗传结构，并研究了与胃肠道和精神表型的遗传重叠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-genic-overlap- Between-IBS-胃肠道疾病-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-genic-overlap- Between-IBS-胃肠道疾病-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc5bd629-3091-4b39-931d-fb8e4d55e446 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Study finds genetic overlap between IBS, gastrointestinal diseases, and psychiatric disorders
COVID-19 限制依从性是否会增加年轻人的抑郁症状？研究人员对年轻人进行了调查，以评估 COVID-19 限制依从性与抑郁症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Did-COVID-19-restriction-compliance-increase-depressive-symptoms-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Did-COVID-19-restriction-compliance-increase-depressive-symptoms-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a91af97-13ac-4bf9-8da8-f9963af3a8c7 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Did COVID-19 restriction compliance increase depressive symptoms in young adults?
西方饮食是重度抑郁症的危险因素吗？研究人员调查了西方饮食（WD）是否是重度抑郁症（MDD）患者的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Is-a-Western-diet-a-risk-factor-for-major-depressive-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Is-a-Western-diet-a-risk-factor-for-major-depressive-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b12c0008-c159-41ac-a07d-5d9ac89b3070 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:45:00 -0400 Is a Western diet a risk factor for major depressive disorder?
新的人工智能平台可以让牙医更准确地读取放射线照片人工智能 (AI) 平台可以让牙医和牙科学生更准确地读取放射线照片（X 射线），帮助他们更好地检测蛀牙和牙龈疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/New-AI-platform-could-allow-dentists-to-read-radiograms-with-higher-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/New-AI-platform-could-allow-dentists-to-read-radiograms-with-higher-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19510fae-ffb8-4b43-ac67-add7e6842fd3 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:17:35 -0400 New AI platform could allow dentists to read radiograms with higher accuracy
用于医疗器械制造的医用级粘合剂在本次采访中，Master Bond 介绍了用于医疗器械制造的医用级粘合剂的特性和优点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Medical-grade-adhesives-for-medical-device-manufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Medical-grade-adhesives-for-medical-device-manufacturing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cacc20c-6511-4f87-8cfe-d03abfd140b9 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:14:00 -0400 Medical grade adhesives for medical device manufacturing
弗吉尼亚理工大学参与三个生物科学合作项目，以解决未满足的医疗保健需求弗吉尼亚理工大学负责健康科学与技术的副校长迈克尔·弗里德兰德 (Michael Friedlander) 表示，在 Virginia Catalyst（也称为弗吉尼亚生物科学健康研究公司）的资助下，弗吉尼亚理工大学正在开展三个生物科学合作项目，以解决弗吉尼亚州未满足的医疗保健需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Virginia-Tech-engages-in- Three-collaborative-bioscience-projects-to-address-unmet-health-care-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Virginia-Tech-engages-in- Three-collaborative-bioscience-projects-to-address-unmet-health-care-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be83b854-4949-4966-8f87-85b74d5e84a1 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 08:53:15 -0400 Virginia Tech engages in three collaborative bioscience projects to address unmet health care needs
